vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: mo.a.vi (מוֹאָבִי "Moab" H4125)
§ Moab = "of his father"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a son of Lot by his eldest daughter
2) the nation descended from the son of Lot
n pr loc
3) the land inhabited by the descendants of the son of Lot
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
摩押 这个字在原文的意思是 "他父親的"
陽性專有名詞
1) 羅得和他的大女兒所生的兒子
2) 羅得兒子的後裔所建立的國家
專有名詞 地名
3) 羅得兒子的後裔所居住的地方
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
摩押 这个字在原文的意思是 "他父亲的"
阳性专有名词
1) 罗得和他的大女儿所生的儿子
2) 罗得儿子的后裔所建立的国家
专有名词 地名
3) 罗得儿子的后裔所居住的地方

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.19.37;
son of: Lot (H3876) and his first daughter (H3876H);
half-brother of Ben-ammi (H1151);
§ Moab = "of his father"
n pr m
1) a son of Lot by his eldest daughter
2) the nation descended from the son of Lot
n pr loc
3) the land inhabited by the descendants of the son of Lot
